title: Accidental puncture and laceration during a procedure, not elsewhere classified
chapter: Injury, poisoning and certain other consequences of external causes
block: Complications of surgical and medical care, not elsewhere classified
category: Complications of procedures, not elsewhere classified
inclusion: Accidental perforation of: blood vessel by catheter during a procedure
Accidental perforation of: blood vessel by endoscope during a procedure
Accidental perforation of: blood vessel by instrument during a procedure
Accidental perforation of: blood vessel by probe during a procedure
Accidental perforation of: nerve by catheter during a procedure
Accidental perforation of: nerve by endoscope during a procedure
Accidental perforation of: nerve by instrument during a procedure
Accidental perforation of: nerve by probe during a procedure
Accidental perforation of: organ by catheter during a procedure
Accidental perforation of: organ by endoscope during a procedure
Accidental perforation of: organ by instrument during a procedure
Accidental perforation of: organ by probe during a procedure
exclusion: birth trauma
obstetric trauma
malunion of fracture
nonunion of fracture [pseudarthrosis]
pathological fracture
pathological fracture with osteoporosis
stress fracture
adverse effects of drugs and medicaments
any encounters with medical care for postoperative conditions in which no complications are present, such as: artificial opening status
any encounters with medical care for postoperative conditions in which no complications are present, such as: closure of external stoma
any encounters with medical care for postoperative conditions in which no complications are present, such as: fitting and adjustment of external prosthetic device
burns and corrosions from local applications and irradiation
complications of surgical procedures during pregnancy, childbirth and the puerperium
poisoning and toxic effects of drugs and chemicals
specified complications classified elsewhere, such as: cerebrospinal fluid leak from spinal puncture
specified complications classified elsewhere, such as: colostomy malfunction
specified complications classified elsewhere, such as: disorders of fluid and electrolyte balance
specified complications classified elsewhere, such as: functional disturbances following cardiac surgery
specified complications classified elsewhere, such as: postgastric surgery syndromes
specified complications classified elsewhere, such as: postlaminectomy syndrome NEC
specified complications classified elsewhere, such as: postmastectomy lymphoedema syndrome
specified complications classified elsewhere, such as: postsurgical blind-loop syndrome
accidental puncture or laceration during a procedure
complications following: infusion, transfusion and therapeutic injection
complications following: procedure NEC
specified complications classified elsewhere, such as: complications of: anaesthesia in: labour and delivery
specified complications classified elsewhere, such as: complications of: anaesthesia in: pregnancy
specified complications classified elsewhere, such as: complications of: anaesthesia in: puerperium
specified complications classified elsewhere, such as: devices, implants and grafts
damage from instruments during delivery
perforation, puncture or laceration caused by device or implant intentionally left in operation wound
specified complications classified elsewhere, such as broad ligament laceration syndrome [Allen-Masters]
